sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Grid, Paper, Chip, Divider, LinearProgress } from '@mui/material'; import { AreaChart, Area, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, LineChart, Line, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { Lightbulb, TrendingUp, Warning } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { salesData, churnData, predictiveData } from '../data/analyticsData'; // Scenario simulation data const scenarioData = [ { month: 'Jan', currentPath: 5200, optimistic: 5500, pessimistic: 4800 }, { month: 'Feb', currentPath: 5400, optimistic: 5900, pessimistic: 4600 }, { month: 'Mar', currentPath: 5800, optimistic: 6500, pessimistic: 4400 }, { month: 'Apr', currentPath: 6100, optimistic: 7200, pessimistic: 4200 }, { month: 'May', currentPath: 6400, optimistic: 7800, pessimistic: 4100 }, { month: 'Jun', currentPath: 6800, optimistic: 8500, pessimistic: 3900 }, ]; const Predictive = () => { return ( {/* Header */} ðŸ”® Predictive Analytics "What will happen next?" â€” Forecasting future performance using regression models {/* Model Info */} Prediction Model Used Algorithm: Linear Regression Training Data: 12 months historical Accuracy (RÂ²): 0.87 (87%) {/* Sales Forecast (FULL WIDTH) */} Sales Forecast â€” Next 3 Months Solid line = actual data. Faded area = predicted trend based on regression model. Prediction: Sales are projected to reach â‚¹5,800 by Q1 end, representing a 15% increase over current levels if pricing remains at â‚¹105. {/* Scenario Analysis */} Scenario Analysis: "What If?" Three scenarios modeled based on different pricing strategies over the next 6 months. OPTIMISTIC â‚¹8,500 +63% growth CURRENT PATH â‚¹6,800 +31% growth PESSIMISTIC â‚¹3,900 -25% decline {/* Churn Prediction */} Customer Churn Prediction ML model classifies customers into risk segments based on purchase frequency and complaints. `${group} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`}> {churnData.map((entry, index) => ( ))} {churnData.map(item => ( {item.group} {item.value} customers ))} Churn Risk Factors Feature importance from the predictive model: {[ { factor: 'Price Sensitivity', weight: 82 }, { factor: 'Competitor Offers', weight: 68 }, { factor: 'Complaint History', weight: 55 }, { factor: 'Purchase Frequency', weight: 45 }, { factor: 'Product Returns', weight: 30 }, ].map(item => ( {item.factor} {item.weight}% 70 ? '#d32f2f' : item.weight > 50 ? '#ff9800' : '#4caf50', borderRadius: 4 } }} /> ))} Alert: 100 customers classified as "At Risk". Estimated revenue loss if churned: â‚¹12,400/month. ); }; export default Predictive;
